bug.description: Hi there, I did a pip install from source and found that konia.angle_axis_to_rotation_matrix and konia.rotation_matrix_to_angle_axis are not consistent. I did the following: input = torch.rand(1, 3) output = kornia.angle_axis_to_rotation_matrix(input) input_back = kornia.rotation_matrix_to_angle_axis(output) input and input_back will not be the same. Also I tried quaternion, which seems working fine. input = torch.rand(1, 3) output = kornia.angle_axis_to_quaternion(input) input_back = kornia.quaternion_to_angle_axis(output) rotation_matrix_output = kornia.quaternion_to_rotation_matrix(output) output_back = kornia.rotation_matrix_to_quaternion(rotation_matrix_output) input_matrix_to_angle_axis = kornia.rotation_matrix_to_angle_axis(rotation_matrix_output) input, input_back and input_matrix_to_angle_axis are the same, output and output_back are the same as well. So it seems that kornia.rotation_matrix_to_angle_axis is correct, while kornia.angle_axis_to_rotation_matrix is not.

comments.comment: Further inverstigation seems that kornia.angle_axis_to_rotation_matrix is correct, while kornia.rotation_matrix_to_angle_axis is wrong.
